    • Graph

      public Graph(boolean isDirected, int maxnodelength, int maxweightlength)
      Constructor useful during the decoding process
      Parameters:
      isDirected - flag to set if the graph is directed or not
      maxnodelength - flag to set the number of bit used by each node
      maxweightlength - flag to set the number of bit used by the weight
